title: Meetings — Monday, June 4, 2018
content: Monday Clinton Village Board, 7 p.m. Lumbard Memorial Hall, North Park Row.   Constableville Village Board, 6 p.m. Meeting room, Bell Tower, Schuyler Street.  Oneida Castle Village Board, 7 p.m. Village Fire Station.   Verona Town Board, 6 p.m. Verona Town Office Building, 6600 Germany Road. Westmoreland Planning Board, 7 p.m. Westmoreland Town Hall, 100 Station Road. Lee Fire District Board of Commissioners, 7:30 p.m. Lee Town Hall, 5808 Stokes-Lee Center Road.
